name: November (Loki)
description:
November is a Psychedelic horror story. Buy the game and you get around 40+ minutes of psychedelic gameplay with photorealistic graphics,40+ unique paintings and 12+ voice-over notes, 3+ great ambients music, 3 retro filters. Immerse yourself in the story of November, discover the tragic story and explore the various locations. 

WASD - Move
MOUSE - Look
E - Interact

The size of the game is 6+ gigabytes or 3+ gb archive (yes, the game weighs a lot, but in return you get great graphics), so the archive will contain a link to google disk, where the archive with the game is stored.

Recommended configurations
GPU - GeForce GTX 1080 ti 

CP - intel i5+

Ram - 8gb

13371337ddd@gmail.com - contact mail

P.S A little advice, if you have a weak PC don't leave the Michael's room and basement right away, wait for the filter to change and the new level to be loaded.
